creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hello,
In my understanding Test Fragment can be used to save "HTTP Proxy Server" configuration in Test Plan.

But it is not possible currently to add directly a "HTTP Proxy Server" to it.
To do so, we must add it to Workbench and test copy/paste it in "Test Fragment".

I think it should be possible to add it directly in Test Fragment.

Regards
Philippe

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: No, Test Fragments are only intended for use by the Include or Module Controllers

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hello Sebb,
But this "Test Fragment" is really useful to save Proxy Config and elements that can only be added to Workbench.

By the way Milamber documented it on his blog this way and I (and other blog readers) discovered it this way so that's why I suggested this change:
http://blog.milamberspace.net/index.php/2011/08/18/apache-jmeter-2-5-est-sorti-964.html 
Search for "Fragment d’éléments"


But maybe the change would be to save workbench ?
